title: Add chat exit and navigation between different chat boxes

requirements.text: Add a close/exit button to the chat interface that allows users to return to a chat selection view or main navigation

quotes: make it so you can exit out of chats to go to diffrent boxes

acceptanceCriteria: A visible close or back button is present in the chat interface
Clicking the button navigates the user away from the current chat
The navigation destination is appropriate (e.g., chat list, main menu, or previous view)

requirements.text: Implement navigation between different chat boxes/sessions, allowing users to switch between multiple chat conversations

quotes: make it so you can exit out of chats to go to diffrent boxes

acceptanceCriteria: Users can view a list of available chat boxes/sessions
Users can select and switch to a different chat box
Each chat box maintains its own conversation history
The current active chat is visually indicated

requirements.text: Ensure ChatSidebar component displays all available chat boxes and allows selection to navigate between them
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a chat in the sidebar switches the active conversation
The selected chat is highlighted in the sidebar

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity hook or authentication flow
Maintain existing chat message history functionality
Preserve the current ChatView and ChatSidebar component structure
nonGoals: Multi-user chat rooms or group chats
